players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I had to kill Diana because she was suspicious. I think Charlie is mafia. He was too calm."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice and found she is mafia. Diana was innocent. I'm not the mafia, I'm the detective. Vote Alice."
Bob: "Charlie, how can you claim you investigated Alice yet also be the mafia? Alice, your claim to kill Diana seems suspicious. I think Charlie is the mafia."
Bob: "Alice, you killed Diana and Charlie said you are mafia. Vote Alice."
You: "Bob, Charlie claims he investigated me but that would be a lie if he's mafia. I killed Diana because she was suspicious. His calmness is typical of a detective. Don't trust him."
Charlie: "Alice, I'm the detective. I investigated you and found you are mafia. Your claim to kill Diana is suspicious. Vote Alice."
